title: Pakistan Limits Outdoor Activities To Curb Air-Pollution Related Illness
content: Pakistan's Punjab province banned most outdoor activities and ordered shops, markets and malls in some areas to close early from Monday to curb illnesses caused by intense air pollution.
summary: Pakistan's Punjab province banned most outdoor activities and ordered shops, markets and malls in some areas to close early from Monday to curb illnesses caused by intense air pollution.

title: How Will Qatar's Suspension From Mediation Impact Israel-Hamas War?

title: Barbie Maker Mistakenly Prints Porn Site Address On Dolls Package. Apologises

title: Dutch Police Use Hologram To Solve 2009 Amsterdam Sex Worker's Murder
content: The Netherlands Police are using an innovative life-size hologram of a sex worker, killed in Amsterdam in February 2009, to uncover new information about the cold case and bring her killer or killers to justice.

title: This Small City Is The 'Eyeglasses Capital' Of Japan: Why You Must Visit
